snippet: FRANKEL--Mickey (Muriel). UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Mickey Frankel, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Mickey's husband, Steven; her brother, Louis Morris; her children, Jill (Steven), Pamela (Jon), and Wendy (Adam); her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: FRANKEL--Mickey (Muriel). UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Mickey Frankel, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Mickey's husband, Steven; her brother, Louis Morris; her children, Jill (Steven), Pamela (Jon), and Wendy (Adam); her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
